title: Ageless
description: Violet Swanson's 18th birthday promises a supernatural surprise that rocks her world.Raised by strict grandparents who never considered her worthy of their time, Violet grew into a quiet, studious young woman. Friends, parties, and boys were the furthest thing from her mind during her time at Bayersfield Prep. A chance invite to a popular student's intimate house party on the eve of graduation opens Violet's eyes to a world she never knew existed.Jeremiah and Jonah Montrose are two brothers on a mission. They need Violet's help, but first she has to accept and be accepted into their world. Violet soon learns that the mysterious Montrose brothers aren't the only ones seeking her out. Surrounded by danger, she has to decide who she can trust as one thing becomes clear. There is no escaping her destiny. Violet holds the key to unlocking the truth of an ancient myth, but only if she lives long enough to turn eighteen.
author: Cege Smith
